snippet.title: Zen Pinball 2 on PlayStation 4
snippet.description:
It's pinball time on PS4! Zen Pinball 2 is now available on PlayStation®4, featuring a selection of tables from the previous generation's table library.  If you already own these tables on PS3 or PS Vita, we invite you to download them for FREE on PS4!

The Sorcerer's Lair table is absolutely free for all players, giving you the opportunity to try the game risk free!
